name: The Last Button
description:
THE LAST BUTTON An Open-World Dystopian Action-Adventure Game

Once, there was a land where buttons existed.  Some were used to benefit society, some were used to cause chaos and pain. The king, in all his wisdom, decided to ban all buttons! except for one, which he keeps at the throne at all times.

Ava and Eva Knowles royal guards for the king. As part of their job, they need to risk their lives in order to confiscate any buttons in sight, in order to enforce the king's draconian laws. Can they achieve this? What does the king's button do? Find out in THE LAST BUTTON!

Features:

  • A well-rounded narrative with fully animated cutscenes
  • Variety of enemies and interesting characters.
  • Original Music
  • Why are you reading this? Just play the game already!

Made for the 2021 "So bad it's good" Jam in 9 days.
